meanings.definition: A person who devises or plans something.
meanings.sent1: The devisors of the school play worked hard to create a wonderful performance.
meanings.sent2: The devisors of the new marketing strategy met to discuss their ideas.
meanings.sent3: The devisors of the surprise party kept their plans secret from the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: She was the mastermind, the devisors of the elaborate heist.
meanings.sent5: The devisors of the escape plan carefully plotted each step to freedom.

meanings.definition: A device or tool used for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen devisors made cooking easier with their innovative gadgets.
meanings.sent2: His phone was a handy devisors for staying connected with friends.
meanings.sent3: The fishing devisors helped him catch the biggest fish in the lake.
meanings.sent4: Her camera was a magical devisors capturing precious moments in time.
meanings.sent5: The compass was a reliable devisors guiding them through the dense forest.
